thread.title: Maybe HE's born with it? Maybelline welcomes first male makeup star
thread.title_full: Maybe HE's born with it? Maybelline welcomes first male makeup star

author: Carly Mallenbaum, USA TODAY
title: Maybe HE's born with it? Maybelline welcomes first male makeup star
text:
Maybe HE's born with it? Maybelline welcomes first male makeup star Carly Mallenbaum , USA TODAY 4:46 p.m. ET Jan. 5, 2017 10 Shares 
Beauty vlogger Manny Gutierrez, right, with Jeffree Star, is Maybelline's first male ambassador. (Photo: Jamie McCarthy, Getty Images for Marc Jacobs) 
Maybe he's born with it, too! 
Male beauty vlogger Manny Gutierrez, known on Instagram and YouTube as "MannyMua," has become the first male face of Maybelline. He shared the news that he's starring in the brand's Big Shot Mascara campaign with fellow social media star Shayla Mitchell. "Honestly I couldn't be more honored thrilled!" he wrote. "Thank you to Maybelline for taking a chance on me!" A video posted by ðŸŒ™Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Jan 3, 2017 at 6:01pm PST 
Gutierrez, who has 3 million Instagram followers and 2 million YouTube subscribers, writes in his page descriptions that "I believe makeup is GenderLESS and has not rules" and "boys deserve just as much cosmetic recognition." A video posted by Maybelline New York (@maybelline) on Jan 3, 2017 at 5:18pm PST 
Maybelline's hiring of Gutierrez is a big step in what has been a recent shift in the cosmetic industry, to cater to more men. A few months ago, CoverGirl named its first CoverBoy , James Charles, and former fashion writer David Yi launched a new beauty site for men , called Very Good Light. 
For more of Gutierrez's makeup looks check out some glam shots from his Instagram: A photo posted by ðŸŒ™Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Nov 4, 2016 at 7:13pm PDT A photo posted by ðŸŒ™Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Nov 22, 2016 at 7:12pm PST A photo posted by ðŸŒ™Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Oct 21, 2016 at 5:59pm PDT Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2hXEe0h Most Popular
